CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 值；值…钱；价值…；有…价值；有做…的价值；相当于…价值；值得做…；财产有（…的）
价值；价值…的东西；作用；用处；持续（…时间）的东西；能用（…时间）的东西；（…之多的）分量；值…的分量；（Worth）沃思（人名）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 值得的；有价值的；配得上的，相称的；可尊敬的；应…的
无价值的；不值钱的；卑微的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 形容词，用作表语或定语，指某事物是值得的，或某事是值得做的。
前置词，后接名词或相当于名词的词，指做某事有一定价值或意义。
形容词，与worth同义，但搭配不相同。
侧重指使用价值，着重人、物或事所具有的重要性、用途或优秀品质等。
与value近义，但前者强调事物本身的价值。

word_group.brief_definition: 值得的；值得麻烦的；值得花钱的
双鸟在林不如一鸟在手(指:满足于现有的总比因过分追求而失去一切好)
word_group.phrase: a bird in the hand is worth two in the bush

word_group.brief_definition: 不知是否重要；不知是否属实
胜任的；称职的；有能力的

word_group.phrase: be not worth the paper it is written on
the game's not worth the candle

bilingual.source: And it's worth it if my old partner turns up.
bilingual.target: 如果我的老伙伴出现了，这一切都是值得的。

bilingual.source: It was hard work, but it was worth it in the end.
bilingual.target: 这工作很辛苦，但最终是值得的。

bilingual.source: It is hard work, but the young people working at the shelter think it is worth it.
bilingual.target: 这是一项艰苦的工作，但在收容所工作的年轻人认为这是值得的。

bilingual.source: It is worth spending the time to learn about the customs of a country before you go there.
bilingual.target: 在去一个国家之前，花时间了解那里的习俗是值得的。

bilingual.source: It's not worth it to argue over small things.
bilingual.target: 为小事争论是不值得的。

bilingual.source: Organic food can be pricey, but it's worth it.
bilingual.target: 有机食品可能会很昂贵，但它是值得的。

bilingual.source: In the long term, this investment is worth it.
bilingual.target: 长期来看，这个投资是值得的。

bilingual.source: It's not worth it to quarrel with your friends.
bilingual.target: 和朋友争吵是不值得的。

bilingual.source: It's not worth it to fite over such small issues.
bilingual.target: 为了这么小的事情打架是不值得的。

yingyinNormal.en: So fixing their hearts is worth breaking mine? It's kind of worth it. He can do like six operations a day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 去给他们治心脏就要伤我的心吗？还是挺值得的，他每天可以做六台手术。

yingyinNormal.en: I know the process is frustrating, but it's so worth it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道过程是让人沮丧的，不过是值得的。

yingyinNormal.en: Jim's new approach takes more time, energy, and rehearsal, but it's been well worth the effort.
yingyinNormal.zh: Jim的新方法虽然花上了比较多时间、经历和练习，但是一切的努力都是值得的。

yingyinNormal.en: It's worth it anyway. I think it's wonderful to have somebody among us who looks for the good in everything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无论怎样都是值得的，我觉得身边有个人无论什么事都能向好的方向看是件很美妙的事。

yingyinNormal.en: So you know how much we charge, Maggie? Yeah, Lucca said $150 an hour. It's worth it if you can make him stop calling.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道我们的收费标准吧，玛姬？知道，卢卡说每小时一百五十美元，如果能阻止他再打来，花这些钱是值得的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, not at first, but it was very intricate work and they said even though they lost their sight, it was all worth it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本来不是的，但这工作非常伤眼力，她们说虽然她们眼睛瞎了，但这还是很值得的。

yingyinNormal.en: It was worth a try.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但也值得一试。

yingyinNormal.en: And worth a King's ransom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 值得国王付出代价赎回。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies》

yingyinNormal.en: Was the pain worth it? I don't know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 伤心痛苦值不值得呢？不知道。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, Precious. Mike's not worth this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，珍贵，麦克不值得你这样。

yingyinNormal.en: Is it really worth getting upset about?
yingyinNormal.zh: 值得那么难过吗？

yingyinNormal.en: That there is a video game worth a preorder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这下有个电子游戏值得预定了。

yingyinNormal.en: This could be worth billions to the right buyer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种装备对合适的买家来说可值几十亿。

yingyinNormal.en: Nobody does anything worth doing without a degree.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有学位的人做不了大事。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'll give you a nickel's worth of free advice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 再给你个免费忠告。

yingyinNormal.en: Today, it would be worth more than the Hope Diamond.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如今它的价值可远超过"希望之钻"。

yingyinNormal.en: That sounds rather small beer. Is it worth the bother?
yingyinNormal.zh: 听起来不是什么大事，有必要大老远来一趟吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, because then the bills wouldn't be worth anything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为，这样一来钞票就失去价值了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, because then the bills wouldn't be worth anything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为，这样一来钞票就失去价值了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's an industry worth an estimated $1.5 billion a year.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是个每年创造大约十五亿美元产值的工业。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 值一定金额的商品; 相当于一定时间内生产的量

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无价值的；不值钱的；没用处的；没有优点的；无足轻重的；应被鄙视的；可鄙的
adj. 不值得的；不配得到的；无价值的；无用的；不可接受的；不当的
adj. 值得努力的；值得重视的；值得敬重的；好的；值得的；优秀的；应得的；相配的；好意（但缺乏幽默和想像力）的；适合的

word_family.mean: adj. 相当于…价值的；值…钱的

sense_info_list.en: sufficiently good, important, or interesting to justify a specified action; deserving to be treated or regarded in the way specified

examination_example.sentence: How do you decide whether it's <highlight>worth</highlight> speaking up?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你如何决定它是否值得说出来?

examination_example.sentence: But would life be <highlight>worth</highlight> living?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是生活值得继续下去吗?

examination_example.sentence: Before explaining the connection to the Obamacare, it is <highlight>worth</highlight> making an important distinction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在解释与奥巴马医改方案的关系之前，有必要做一个重要的区分。

examination_example.sentence: Good governance rests on an understanding of the inherent <highlight>worth</highlight> of each individual.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 善政基于对每个人固有价值的理解。

examination_example.sentence: Fashion industry must take responsibility for the signal it sends women about the social tape-measure they must use to determine their individual <highlight>worth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时尚界必须对其向女性发出的信号负责，即女性必须使用社会尺度来衡量自己的个人价值。

sense_info_list.en: equivalent in value to the sum or item specified
the amount that could be achieved or produced in a specified time
sense_info_list.zh: 值一定金额的商品; 相当于一定时间内生产的量

sense_info_list.en: having money and possessions of a particular value

word_usage.usage:
worth作形容词指“值得”时，常用句型be worth sth./doing sth.，worth后不可接动词不定式。例：
The book was definitely worth reading.
这本书真的很值得看。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 用作形容词，意为“值……的、值得的、有……价值的”，后接v.+ing；用作名词，意为“价值（value）”。
意为“值得做的、值得花时间（精力）的”。
意为“值得某人费事或操劳的”。
意为“值得的、有价值的、可尊敬的”，后接不定式或介词"of"。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 有意义的; 值得(费周折)的; 价值; 意义
值得某价格的; 价格

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 不值得的,无用的,无价值的,不足道的卑劣的,卑微的
adj. 无价值的；不值钱的；没用处的；没有优点的；无足轻重的；应被鄙视的；可鄙的
n. 值得；有价值；相当；价值
adj. 值得努力的；值得重视的；值得敬重的；好的；值得的；优秀的；应得的；相配的；好意（但缺乏幽默和想像力）的；适合的

word_family.mean: adj. 相当于…价值的；值…钱的

sense_info_list.en: sufficiently good, important, or interesting to justify a specified action; deserving to be treated or regarded in the way specified
sense_info_list.zh: 有意义的; 值得(费周折)的; 价值; 意义

examination_example.sentence: But starting conversations with strangers is still well <highlight>worth</highlight> the risk of rejection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但与陌生人开始交谈仍然非常值得冒被拒绝的风险。

sense_info_list.en: equivalent in value to the sum or item specified
sense_info_list.zh: 值得某价格的; 价格

examination_example.sentence: Burberry's plan to destroy its unsold products <highlight>worth</highlight> millions of dollars aroused public indignation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 博柏利销毁价值数百万美元的未售出产品的计划激起了公愤。

examination_example.sentence: In March, a report revealed that H&M was struggling with $4.3 billion <highlight>worth</highlight> of unsold stock.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年3月，一份报告显示，H&M积压了价值43亿美元的库存。

examination_example.sentence: Last week, Burberry's annual report revealed that £28.6 million <highlight>worth</highlight> of stock was burnt last year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，Burberry的年度报告显示，去年有价值2860万英镑的库存被烧毁。

examination_example.sentence: Follow up studies have found that those who chose to delay satisfaction are now more academically successful, and have greater self-<highlight>worth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后续研究发现，那些选择延迟满足的人现在在学业上更成功，自我价值更高。

examination_example.sentence: Discrepancy between the privileges they feel they're owed and their inflated sense of self-<highlight>worth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们自己应得的特权与夸大的自我价值感之间存在差异。

examination_example.sentence: They lack a strong sense of self-<highlight>worth</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们缺乏强烈的自我价值感。

sense_info_list.en: the amount that could be achieved or produced in a specified time

word_usage.usage: worth常用于be worth doing结构中，动名词在这里表示被动意义。

worth、worthy两者区别：
worth是介词性质，不能作定语，作表语时后面必须接名词性词组；
worthy是形容词，可用作定语，作表语时后面接“of＋名词”或动词不定式。
示例：这部电影值得看。
正 This movie is worth watching.
正 This movie is worthy to watch.
正 This movie is worthy of watching.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 有意义的; 值得的; 价值; 意义
值得某价格的; 价格

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无价值的；不值钱的；没用处的；没有优点的；无足轻重的；应被鄙视的；可鄙的
adj. 值得努力的；值得重视的；值得敬重的；好的；值得的；优秀的；应得的；相配的；好意（但缺乏幽默和想像力）的；适合的

word_family.mean: adj. 相当于…价值的；值…钱的

sense_info_list.en: sufficiently good; important; or interesting to justify a specified action; deserving to be treated or regarded in the way specified
sense_info_list.zh: 有意义的; 值得的; 价值; 意义

examination_example.sentence: He said the new finding is apparently reasonable and <highlight>worth</highlight> some attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他说新的发现显然是合理的，值得关注。

examination_example.sentence: It may help children learn the <highlight>worth</highlight> of labor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以帮助孩子们了解劳动的价值。

examination_example.sentence: How to achieve mental calmness and contentment is well <highlight>worth</highlight> our consideration today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如何做到心平气和，心满意足，很值得现如今的我们思考。

sense_info_list.en: equivalent in value to the sum or item specified
sense_info_list.zh: 值得某价格的; 价格

examination_example.sentence: It was from 1855 and <highlight>worth</highlight> as much as $2,000.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这幅画创作于1855年，价值高达2000美元。

examination_example.sentence: The aircraft was carrying 265 million pounds <highlight>worth</highlight> of gold and diamonds, when the door flew open—sending the precious metal back to earth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 飞机上载有价值2.65亿英镑的黄金和钻石，舱门突然打开，这些贵重金属被送回了地球。

examination_example.sentence: A waiter has returned a check <highlight>worth</highlight> nearly $424,000 to the retired social worker who lost it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一名服务员将一张价值近42.4万美元的支票退还给了丢失支票的退休社会工作者。

examination_example.sentence: There's a lot on the internet about a ban in Florida, but a few days <highlight>worth</highlight> of digging found no such legislation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 网上有很多关于佛罗里达州禁令的消息，但是在维持数天的调查中没有发现这样的立法。

examination_example.sentence: One used bookstore received a month's <highlight>worth</highlight> of books in donations in a week when a man gave over fifty boxes of books.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一家旧书店在一周内收到了可维持一个月销售量的捐赠书，当时一名男子捐赠了五十多箱书。

word_usage.usage:
worth、worthy两者区别：
worth是介词性质，不能作定语，作表语时后面必须接名词性词组；
worthy是形容词，可用作定语，作表语时后面接“of＋名词”或动词不定式。
示例：这部电影值得看。
正 This movie is worth watching.
正 This movie is worthy to watch.
正 This movie is worthy of watching.
worth常用于be worth doing结构中，动名词在这里表示被动意义。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无价值的；不值钱的；没用处的；没有优点的；无足轻重的；应被鄙视的；可鄙的
adj. 值得努力的；值得重视的；值得敬重的；好的；值得的；优秀的；应得的；相配的；好意（但缺乏幽默和想像力）的；适合的

word_family.mean: adj. 相当于…价值的；值…钱的

sense_info_list.en: sufficiently good, important, or interesting to justify a specified action; deserving to be treated or regarded in the way specified

examination_example.sentence: In addition to practical skills, Pruitt's lessons teach teamwork, encourage self-<highlight>worth</highlight>, and promote feelings of community.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除了实用技能外，Pruitt的课程还教授团队合作、鼓励自我价值感和促进社区情感。

examination_example.sentence: That's plenty of time for your skin to absorb a day's <highlight>worth</highlight> of Vitamin D.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这段时间足够你的皮肤吸收一天所需的维生素D。

examination_example.sentence: For many who made it to Dawson, however, the rewards were <highlight>worth</highlight> the difficult trip.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，对于许多成功到达道森的人来说，这趟艰难的旅程是值得的。

word_usage.usage: “be worth+动名词”表示被动含义，意思是“值得做某事”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 有意义的; 价值; 意义
值某价的商品;时间内的量

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无价值的；不值钱的；没用处的；没有优点的；无足轻重的；应被鄙视的；可鄙的
adj. 值得努力的；值得重视的；值得敬重的；好的；值得的；优秀的；应得的；相配的；好意（但缺乏幽默和想像力）的；适合的

word_family.mean: adj. 相当于…价值的；值…钱的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 值得的；值得麻烦的；值得花钱的

sense_info_list.en: sufficiently good, important, or interesting to justify a specified action; deserving to be treated or regarded in the way specified
sense_info_list.zh: 有意义的; 价值; 意义

examination_example.sentence: The new kind of hybrid rice is <highlight>worth</highlight> studying.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种新型杂交水稻值得研究。

examination_example.sentence: The island's blue sea, white-sand beaches and the forests are well <highlight>worth</highlight> seeing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 岛上的蓝色大海、白色沙滩和森林非常值得一看。

examination_example.sentence: Those might be <highlight>worth</highlight> trying．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些可能值得一试。

sense_info_list.en: equivalent in value to the sum or item specified

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>worth</highlight> a great deal of money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它值很多钱。

examination_example.sentence: Three years later, he had parts <highlight>worth</highlight> $300, 000.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 三年后，他拥有了价值30万美元的零件。

examination_example.sentence: The horse is well <highlight>worth</highlight> the price.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这匹马物有所值。

sense_info_list.en: the amount that could be achieved or produced in a specified time
sense_info_list.zh: 值某价的商品;时间内的量

examination_example.sentence: I needed two pennies' <highlight>worth</highlight> as a reward for coming to the store alone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我需要两便士作为独自来到商店的奖励。

word_usage.usage: worth常用于be worth doing结构中，动名词在这里表示被动意义。

worth、worthy两者区别：
worth是介词性质，不能作定语，作表语时后面必须接名词性词组；
worthy是形容词，可用作定语，作表语时后面接“of＋名词”或动词不定式。
示例：这部电影值得看。
正 This movie is worth watching.
正 This movie is worthy to watch.
正 This movie is worthy of watching.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 与value近义，但worth强调事物本身的价值。
侧重使用价值，着重指人、事、物所具有的重要性、有用性或优秀品质等。
